response.original_title: Have a Nice Trip: Micro v.s Macro-Dosing for Healing
response.overview: Experts and enthusiasts of the use of Psychedelics for medical uses discuss the pros and cons of Micro Dosing v.s Macro Dosing. Microdosing, where people take minuscule amounts of substances to change patterns of behavior, has brought psychedelics to the mainstream. But is there more to be gained with a much higher dose?
response.tagline: Have a Nice Trip. See You Next Fall.
response.title: Have a Nice Trip: Micro v.s Macro-Dosing for Healing
